theorem.name: add_base_clause

text.english: Base clause of the definition of \(\texttt{add}\): \[ \forall m \in \mathcal{N}Term .\; \texttt{add}(Z, m) = m \]
text.italiano: Clausola base della definizione di \(\texttt{add}\): \[ \forall m \in \mathcal{N}Term .\; \texttt{add}(Z, m) = m \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem add_base_clause : forall m : nterm , add Z m = m.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
